Text: Why remove tracks ??

No need to have the same tracks twice in a collection, unless you want to spoil HDD-space. All tracks are there, so if you want you can duplicate them to the ''incomplete albums''.
Furthermore you can of course add several ''Best of'' albums, then you have it ''COMPLETE!''

Harddisks are cheap and BIG.
Some "unnecessary" tracks can't make that much difference.
